title: Sirius no Densetsu (The Sea Prince and the Fire Child)
synopsis: Gods once lived on earth, and two siblings, Oceanus - God of Water, and Hyperia - Goddess of Fire, lived in peace and dearly loved each other. However, the God of Wind, Algaroc, become jealous of the pair's happiness, and spread lies and deceit between them until their hatred for each other brought about war.
staff: [['Hata, Masami', ['Director', ' Screenplay']], ['Kawajiri, Yoshiaki', ['Key Animation']], ['Satou, Yuuzou', ['Key Animation']], ['Sugiyama, Koichi', ['Music']]]
